rules_text:
[i]Order of Heroes[/i] – Legendary creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Breidablik[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Search your library for a legendary creature card with mana value equal to or less than the number of legendary creatures you control. If you control seven or more legendary creatures, put that creature onto the battlefield. Otherwise, reveal it and put it into your hand.
